item.title: Noobs Are Coming
item.description:
Title: Noobs Are Coming
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie , RPG
Developer: Overboy
Publisher: Overboy
Release Date: Nov 27, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jul 15, 2025




About This Game

YOU ARE THE FINAL BOSS.

  • Arena roguelike inspired by Brotato and The Binding of Isaac

  • You are the Final Boss of a MMORPG

  • 43 Playable Characters with unique gameplay and effects (+ Character Merge feature)

  • 70+ Weapons/Attacks with innovative mechanics (Equip Boss Patterns, Minions, Plants monsters you can grow with your watercan or a Cloud spell etc.)

  • 150+ Items for infinite amount of synergies and combinations

  • 134 Unlockables

  • Singleplayer & Multiplayer (Steam Remote Play Together)

  • 4 players Local Co-op Mode

  • Infinite replay value

  • Create broken builds each run

  • 5 Difficulties + Endless Mode

  • Banger OST

  • Twitch Streamer Mode: Destroy Your Chat (noobs takes usernames/msgs from chat)

  • Quick and Addictive Runs (under 30 minutes)

  • Steam Deck Verified ✅ official Valve certification

NOOBS ARE COMING! Show them who's the boss

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or 11

Earn Money & Buy More Dice

Roll dice to earn money.

Automate

Buy helper hands to automate proccess.

Active Skills

Unlock active skills to roll more dice.

Collect Dark Matter

Extract dark matter from dice, use it in skill tree to upgrade dice.

Skill Tree

item.title: Storage Hunter Simulator
item.description:
Title: Storage Hunter Simulator
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Raccoons Studio
Publisher: astragon Entertainment
Franchise: astragon Entertainment
Release Date: Nov 27, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 10, 2024




About This Game

Master the art of auctions and score big against others for treasures in Storage Hunter Simulator! Stay ahead of the competition in the high risk, great rewards world of storage auctions. Showcase your skills, win auctions in intense bidding wars and sell your hard-earned valuables to your customers. But make sure you turn a profit by getting the best deal! Maximizing your earnings is key to staying in business and building a solid reputation.

Take risks and get in the fight for the best abandoned storages. Enjoy relaxing road trips in your cars as you drive to storage auctions. Spot hidden treasures that no one else sees and get the best bid. Make yourself a name and reputation that's well known and feared among the competition. Are you ready for the next storage hunt?

From trash to treasures: each abandoned storage locker up for auction can contain thousands of unique items for you to spot and auction. Some items may look like garbage! Only with your knowledge and expertise will you be able to recognize their true value and squeeze every dollar from them into your earnings. Not sure about a certain item? Ask the experts, broaden your horizons, or check the in-game glossary. All items come with conditions, certain categories, and there are also collectible sets.

Got the highest bid? Now it's time to take what's yours and try to sell it in your pawnshop or maybe to a quirky collector. Collectors offer unique rewards like cosmetics, cars, or reputation boosts when you help them complete their sometimes bizarre and weird collections.

Use your available cash and run a hands-on business with your own pawnshop. Sell your valuables and roll up to the next auction in style. An item doesn't sell? Use marketing to boost your item's exposure to make a buck quicker! Build your business from the ground up, expand it, and build a network of pawnshops. Handle shelf placement, NPC customers, haggling, upgrading employees, capacities, and specializing in item categories. But keep track of loans and daily costs and financials to avoid going broke. That's the loser's path! And losers don't get the buy their own property.

If you act smart, you'll eventually be able to leave your rusty trailer home behind and expand into residences with garages, larger mansions, and luxury and dedicated warehouses for your most valuable items. Decorate and furnish properties in Architect mode.

Don't want to go on your next storage hunt alone? Invite up to three friends to a wild and chaotic drop-in, drop-out coop ride. Work as a team and live your dream of finding valuable treasures together. Customize your look and hit the road. But make sure you work together on a plan before the auctions start! Because when it's time to pay your bills, your company shares a bank account and only the most capable bidder teams will succeed. Take part in auctions together or share the work by visiting multiple auctions at the same time to maximize your profits. You can also enjoy a fun experience together at the amusement park and invest your hard-earned cash and unlock some unique items while playing fun mini-games.

FEATURES

  • Experience an authentic storage auction experience

  • Customize your look with the wardrobe

  • Thousands of items to buy and sell

  • Unlock hundreds of unique items and cosmetics

  • Play easy mode for a fun experience

  • Play hard mode for a greater challenge

  • Earn achievements to brag with your success

  • Singleplayer

  • Up to 4-Player cooperative multiplayer

  • 7 vehicles with trunk storage and fuel management

  • Refer to experts to verify your treasures

  • Run your own network of pawnshops

  • An open world with 5 districts and secrets to explore

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

AI is used for a part of the localization, voice overs, artworks and other marketing materials.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650/AMD Radeon RX 5500
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Cowboy Life Simulator
item.description:
Title: Cowboy Life Simulator
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , RPG , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Odd Qubit
Publisher: RockGame S.A.
Franchise: RockGame S.A.
Release Date: Nov 26, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Nov 26, 2025




About This Game

Cowboy Life Simulator is an immersive and relaxing single-player Wild West ranching simulator. Step into the boots of a stressed-out businessman who, after a failed venture, decides to change his life and buys a farm in the Wild West. Purchase your first goat and a bag of grain, get to know the local community, and explore diverse, vibrant locations.
Run your ranch and discover what this wild frontier has to offer!


  • Immersive Open World – Travel across a map filled with diverse locations, uncover its secrets, and face challenges.
  • Ranch Building – Build your own ranch, construct utility buildings, farms, and decorations.
  • Farming & Animal Caretaking – Plant, tend to, and harvest over 20 different crops, and take care of your farm animals.
  • Crafting – Create essential items for survival and ranch management.
  • Decorating – Decorate your home to your taste with everyday items like an axe or cans of food.
  • Engaging Storylines – Dive into the extensive history of Bravestand and its surroundings, getting to know your neighbors, near and far, through engaging quests.
  • Interesting Characters – Chat with colorful Wild West inhabitants and become part of the local community.
  • Mysteries to Unfold – Discover the secrets and dilemmas of Bravestand's residents and find out what awaits you in even the most distant corners of the map.
  • Sophisticated Progression – Develop your character's skills and level up in the unique Farm, Fame, Frontier experience system.
  • Light Survival – Collect resources scattered across the map and pay attention to your character's needs.
  • Combat – Shoot various available weapons, upgrade them, and use them to fight animals and gangs terrorizing the area.



The Wild West is teeming with life, especially the small town of Bravestand. Each resident has their habits, favorite places, and problems. Make friends with them, learn the history and life of the town by helping solve the problems of your new neighbors and local residents. Help out and strengthen the bonds of friendship, and you'll gain not only good neighbors but also devoted friends!





Run your ranch in your own style. You decide where your house will stand, where the goat pen will be, and where you'll sow grain and plant cabbage. Create your own corner of the Wild West with many available decorations and buildings. Run your ranch your way, take care of animals, and plant diverse crops. Trade with town residents to get new recipes and gain access to unknown resources.





And after a day's work on the ranch, pull out your revolver and hop on your horse to seek adventure in the farthest corners of the Wild West, uncovering its most hidden secrets! Find out what lurks in the abandoned mine and what's the deal with that giant rock?

Join the Cowboy Community!


Become part of the Cowboy Life Simulator community! Join our growing Discord server and be first in line for all news and updates about the game's development – straight from the developers, from the heart of the studio! Follow our social media to stay up-to-date with future plans, such as upcoming playtests, new feature additions, and future projects – don't miss out on anything!




Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or Radeon equivalent
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 /AMD Ryzen 7 2700
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 8GB or Radeon equivalent
    • Storage: 15 GB available space

item.title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails
item.description:
Title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: TaleWorlds Entertainment
Publisher: TaleWorlds Entertainment
Franchise: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord , Mount & Blade
Release Date: Nov 26, 2025




About This Content

Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails

Sail the high seas, lead mighty fleets, and forge your legacy in War Sails , the epic single-player expansion for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord . Bringing naval warfare to Bannerlord for the first time, War Sails lets players command powerful ships, engage in thrilling sea battles, and master maritime conquest.

Embark on daring naval adventures with new mechanics, territories, and challenges. Customize your fleet, conquer settlements, and carve your legend on the high seas!

MEET THE NORDS, A NEW VIKING-INSPIRED FACTION

Chart your course to the Northern Kingdom, home of the fearless Nords—legendary seafarers and masters of close-quarters combat. Explore a land of jagged peaks, vast taigas and freezing fjords, where scattered settlements rise like ships from the sea. A bold adventurer may trade their goods, recruit their warriors, join their ranks or challenge their rule. Will you join the North or seize its riches?

MASTER NAVAL WARFARE

War Sails introduces a unique and immersive naval warfare system that has been inspired by accounts of actual medieval sea battles. Featuring realistic wind and water physics, ship-to-ship combat lets you board enemies from multiple points, ram them, or attack from afar.

Captains can seize opportunities by boarding already engaged ships, prepare for an incoming attack by creating a floating fortress or take a risk to tie down several enemies at once - giving their allies an edge elsewhere. They may ram an enemy ship to sink it - or at least throw men off board, shatter oars and compromise buoyancy. Well-placed arrows and ballista fire can also tear through sails, further crippling mobility.

EXPLORE AN EXPANDED WORLD

Calradia has been reimagined with a northern region, a settled island, coastal waters and open seas. The dynamic weather system was also refined to include storms and trade winds. Ships move faster when riding the gales, but beware—attrition can unravel even the best-laid plans.

The naval systems and Nord faction integrate into Bannerlord’s world, reshaping trade, warfare, and diplomacy. Ship production and new trade goods add regional variety. Coastal towns may grow rich from this — if they can fend off pirates and naval invasions.

Sieges have also been adapted to naval warfare. Armies will have to bring along a fleet and set up a blockade, if they want to stop supplies and reinforcements arriving over sea.

BUILD YOUR FLEET

Players can choose from 18 ship types modelled after historical vessels, each with unique handling, shaped by realistic wind and wave physics. They can be customized with siege engines, cargo holds, sails, rams, and more. Shipyards build and stock vessels based on their town’s culture and development. Players can also capture ships and figureheads in battle.

EXPAND YOUR ARSENAL

The character system has been extended with Nord hairstyles, beards, and tattoos. Three nautical skills were added that enhance navigation, tactics, and stewardship. There are also many new items including spears, swords, axes, shields, and armor.

Troop trees now include mariner troops that are more effective at sea. Players can also recruit new companions with maritime backgrounds.

LEARN THE ROPES

A new questline introduces players to the seas of Calradia through cinematics, scripted missions, and classic Mount & Blade gameplay. Learn how to command your ship, then take it into battle against a pirate confederacy. Lead a growing fleet of newfound allies as you face a range of nautical challenges.

ENHANCED AUDIO

The sounds of the sea come to life with new Mediterranean and Nordic-inspired musical tracks. Experience rich soundscapes with piercing winds, crashing waves and creaking ships. Feel the heat of battle as steel clashes and sailors cry out.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-9100T / AMD Ryzen™ 3 2200G
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 770 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 570 4GB
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs require an additional 2GB of system RAM
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-13600K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 7600X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3060 8GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 6600 XT 8GB
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
